item.title: When github says I cannot merge
item.description: We are evaluating github for our Katello open-source project. While I like plain git more, I have to say github has pretty convenient merge reviews and it's very fast (Rackspace UK-based datacenters are faster than US-based fedorahosted.org; at least for me). Anyway, today I hit my very first git conflict during git pull review process. For some time, github shows this very nice Automerge button, but it only works when request can be clearly merged.
